short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforms your new tab page into a breathtaking landscape of golden wheat fields.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The warm tones of the setting sun blend seamlessly with the deep blues and soft clouds above, creating a peaceful and soothing visual. This theme offers a serene escape into nature every time you open a new tab, perfect for those seeking tranquility in their browsing experience.

Key features:
- Beautiful Sunset background.
- Quick access to frequently visited sites.
- Customizable search bar and shortcuts.
- Real-time weather display and clock.
